1b1('bum): @##// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya sa
1b2('bum): drug pa/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
1b3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
2a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
2a2('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
2a3('bum): mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
2a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
2b1('bum): ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
2b2('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis
2b3('bum): shig/ tshongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2b4('bum): pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan
2b5('bum): byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes
3a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par
3a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
3a3('bum): bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su
3a4('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches
3a5('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
3b1('bum): par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag/
3b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
3b3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
3b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di
3b5('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes
3b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b7('bum): pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
4a1('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang /
4a2('bum): gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes
4a3('bum): bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//
4a4('bum): ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
4a5('bum): byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
4a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
4a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing
4b1('bum): rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs/
4b2('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan
4b3('bum): tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad
4b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su
4b5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
4b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//
4b7('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog go/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig
5a1('bum): rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas//
5a2('bum): na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
5a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzham la rgya cher brjod de
5a4('bum): bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub
5a5('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yi la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab
5a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
5a7('bum): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyis
5b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag
5b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
5b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul
5b4('bum): pab byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
5b5('bum): paba'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
5b6('bum): 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
5b7('bum): 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam pa phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs
6a1('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan
6a2('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod
6a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob
6a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
6a5('bum): gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes
6a6('bum): bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//
6a7('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lnga zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs rba/
6b1('bum): re ning gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul
6b2('bum): ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
6b3('bum): mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher
6b4('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub
6b5('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
6b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
6b7('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
7a1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod
7a2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang
7a3('bum): po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyi
7a4('bum): mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
7a5('bum): ba mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya che
7a6('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bre se gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par
7a7('bum): gyis shig/ rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzham du mngal gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la nan tam 'a shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan par
7b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi ci/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur/
7b2('bum): pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
7b3('bum): pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
7b5('bum): kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ gling chen po bzhi ri 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
7b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la ma/ gsol
7b7('bum): pabacom ldan 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
8a1('bum): 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'dra
8a2('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
8a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
8a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams
8a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
8a6('bum): ba bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel
8a7('bum): lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
8b1('bum): sems can rnams phyir mi ldob pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gos phyir mi ldog
8b2('bum): pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
8b3('bum): mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher
8b4('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub
8b5('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
8b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
8b7('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
9a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
9a2('bum): byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta
9a3('bum): zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
9a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
9a5('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing
9a6('bum): rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/
9a7('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9b1('bum): pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe
9b2('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
9b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub
9b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi
9b5('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/
9b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
9b7('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
10a1('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub
10a2('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shika/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar
10a3('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
10a4('bum): phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe
10a5('bum): khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
10a6('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o/ / ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
10a7('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
10b1('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
10b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
10b3('bum): phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur
10b4('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha
10b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
10b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis
10b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang
11a1('bum): du 'phel lo/ / ji ci'i phyir ne nA/ ko shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//
11a2('bum): / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la
11a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/
11a4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig
11a5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
11a6('bum): na tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod
11a7('bum): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
11b1('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgom/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams
11b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa
11b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
11b4('bum): ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
11b5('bum): tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/
11b6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
11b7('bum): khyod gang gi cha/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang
12a1('bum): g o rgyu khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i rna khyod bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
12a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
12a3('bum): sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
12a4('bum): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
12a5('bum): ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
12a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
12a7('bum): gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//
12b1('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen// /
12b2('bum): pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nam
12b3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par
12b4('bum): gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag zhugs par
12b5('bum): gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
12b6('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/
12b7('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
13a1('bum): pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong par
13a2('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag
13a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod napas ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong garis kyi
13a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
13a5('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab
13a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs
13a7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
13b1('bum): nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs
13b2('bum): kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnam
13b3('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
13b4('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams lta zhog go/ ko'u shi
13b5('bum): ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/
13b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang
13b7('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zung zhig/ kun chub pa bgyis shig/ chongs shig/ ldogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis
14a1('bum): shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de
14a2('bum): tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
14a3('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
14a4('bum): rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med
14a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
14a6('bum): phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'
14a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
14b1('bum): de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka
14b2('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
14b3('bum): dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
14b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub
14b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
14b6('bum): la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka
14b7('bum): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can
15a1('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu'am/
15a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa
15a3('bum): byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/
15a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
15a5('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig
15a6('bum): rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
15a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya ma brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/
15b1('bum): de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu'am/
15b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan ma/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
15b3('bum): lo/ / ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong
15b4('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b5('bum): de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba
15b6('bum): dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
15b7('bum): par 'chang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
16a1('bum): de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / ko shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
16a2('bum): las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16a3('bum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ngor dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan
16a4('bum): par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag
16a5('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge
16a6('bum): dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ri nges pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i byang chung
16a7('bum): tu gzhol zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/ de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/ 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la/ snying rje chen
16b1('bum): pos mnar ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
16b2('bum): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa/ de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar
16b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
16b4('bum): pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
16b5('bum): bstan par bgyi'o/ / ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa/ de lta de ltar rang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
16b6('bum): delnga de ltar phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan
16b7('bum): par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
17a1('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing
17a2('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gangams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de lta
17a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing
17a4('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar
17a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// /
17a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
17a7('bum): stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
17b1('bum): bgyi'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bltar
17b2('bum): par bgyi'o/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa brgyang la gdabs shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mthar gyis gnas pa
17b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mngon par
17b4('bum): shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshes
17b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gdabs shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
17b6('bum): byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
17b7('bum): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyer sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ chos kyis
18a1('bum): bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag/
18a2('bum): gis ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
18a3('bum): bstan pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing
18a4('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su
18a5('bum): bstan pa'o/ / phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// chen po stong
18a6('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid la ga dmas shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la
18a7('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dor ba med pa
18b1('bum): stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rang gi mtshar nyid stong //
18b2('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
18b3('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// yang dag
18b4('bum): par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stobs rnams la
18b5('bum): gangadams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i
18b6('bum): bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
18b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su
19a1('bum): bstan pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing
19a2('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su
19a3('bum): bstan pa'o/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//
19a4('bum): snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// sangs rgyu kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha
19a5('bum): dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs
19a6('bum): so legs so/ / ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
19a7('bum): chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang chos kyis phan gdags pas phan gdags shing
19b1('bum): yongs su bskyed par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo //
19b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
19b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha
19b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
19b5('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
19b6('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
19b7('bum): pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
20a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par/
20a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
20a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
20a4('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// bla na med
20a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/ rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yod par mi 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a6('bum): dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
20a7('bum): pab dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la'ang slob la/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
20b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / ngomangs pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
20b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa 'ing dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
20b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
20b4('bum): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
20b5('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
20b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
20b7('bum): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
21a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
21a2('bum): cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ / byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi
21a3('bum): ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/ / lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho
21a4('bum): ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
21a5('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul
21a6('bum): ngaga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs
21a7('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang
21b1('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i
21b2('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig
21b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
21b4('bum): ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
21b5('bum): mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
21b6('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig
21b7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
22a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
22a2('bum): phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
22a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
22a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de na dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus
22a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma
22a6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams
22a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med
22b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye
22b2('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang
22b3('bum): po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
22b4('bum): pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten
22b5('bum): du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brkyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
22b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa
22b7('bum): rngams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rter du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig
23a1('bum): rter du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig
23a2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig/
23a3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// /
23a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya so bdun pa// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la
23a5('bum): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams
23a6('bum): bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes
23a7('bum): su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang
23b1('bum): tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nag
23b2('bum): bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o//
23b3('bum): mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir
23b4('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnam kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
23b5('bum): dngos po ni/ bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
23b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
23b7('bum): gzugs med pa'o snyoms pa'i 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
24a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang / bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang
24a2('bum): bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang
24a3('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//
24a4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs
24a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa
24a6('bum): de dag dang / lho phrogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med chad med pa yongs su mya ngan
24a7('bum): las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad
24b1('bum): med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom
24b2('bum): ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi
24b3('bum): khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/
24b4('bum): dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
24b5('bum): rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang //
24b6('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las
24b7('bum): 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med chang
25a1('bum): med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ rad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'ang /
25a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
25a3('bum): sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos pa nub kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa
25a4('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi smyon pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
25a5('bum): dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / mi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / de bzhin gshes
25a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
25a7('bum): ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang
25b1('bum): chos bstan pa de dag la bslabs shing / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang /
25b2('bum): rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las
25b3('bum): 'das kyang rung ste/ de dag la dge rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/ gtso bo/ dam pa/ rab/ phul/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ gong na med
25b4('bum): pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
25b5('bum): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag
25b6('bum): par zhugs pa des de skad du smras te/ sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/ dmigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang dag gi/ sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs
25b7('bum): pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs su yod pa yin nam/ byams pas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas
26a1('bum): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no//
26a2('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar dngos po med pa dag dmigs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang / de dag gis thugs
26a3('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa
26a4('bum): dang slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsogs bsdus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
26a5('bum): tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya/
26a6('bum): bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci
26a7('bum): log tu gyur pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar/ de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/ de lta yin
26b1('bum): yang thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
26b2('bum): paba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
26b3('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang
26b4('bum): de bzhin/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ sto pa nyid
26b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das
26b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
26b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
27a1('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams/
27a2('bum): kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam
27a3('bum): gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
27a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/
27a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rang de bzhin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
27a6('bum): pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ / gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin /
27a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ shes
27b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang //
27b2('bum): de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang thar
27b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de
27b4('bum): bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran
27b5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang
27b6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams
27b7('bum): kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/ rnam par
28a1('bum): thar par go stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzas ca/
28a2('bum): rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang de bzhin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
28a3('bum): bco brgyad kyang de bzhin yin na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/ dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/ byang chub de ni gang zhig
28a4('bum): yin/ sems de ni gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin// byams pas
28a5('bum): smras pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
28a6('bum): gyogyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa dag ni/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
28a7('bum): ngag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
28b1('bum): su mi sngo'i/ de dag ri 'di ji ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no// mtshan ma med par
28b2('bum): tshul gyis ma yin no/ / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no// skye/
28b3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no// 'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed
28b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa'ang ma yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'ang ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur
28b5('bum): pa'ang ma yin na/ de dag ni dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
28b6('bum): de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar mi 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du
28b7('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdur du mi bshad do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdur du mi bshad do// brtson
29a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa
29a2('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdur du mi bshad do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstam pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// sbyin
29a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
29a4('bum): dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
29a5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan
29a6('bum): pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad de/
29a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
29b1('bum): / sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/
29b2('bum): de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
29b3('bum): bshad do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
29b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
29b5('bum): de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du
29b6('bum): mi bshad do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la
